Isle of Skaldyr

Island: Skaldyr

Coordinates: 1450,1900

Description

A barren, frost-bitten land where the northern lights dance over vast frozen plains. The isle is home to nomadic tribes.

Background

Once a vibrant island, Skaldyr was ravaged by The Calamity. The nomads now survive by fishing in the icy waters and trading with nearby islands.
